awards.text: Won 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 1 win & 4 nominations.

fullplot: When Alex ruins a family vacation by accidentally casting a horrible spell on her loved ones, Max works overtime to keep his parents from separating while Alex and Justin seek out the "Stone of Dreams" in a desperate race to reverse the curse.
plot: Teenage wizard Alex casts a spell that accidentally changes history so her parents never fell in love. She and her brothers face a race against time to put things right before they are erased from existence.
title: Wizards of Waverly Place: The Movie
